description: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
name: Remote Desktop Protocol Use Mstsc
query: ((((process.executable.text:*\\mstsc.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"mstsc.exe") AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/v\:*) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\lxss\\wslhost.exe")))) OR ((process.executable.text:*\\cmdkey.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"cmdkey.exe") AND (process.command_line.text:*\ \/g* AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/u* AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/p*)))
author: frack113
